projects.title: Maze Solver
projects.description: It is an interactive web application that can create and solve mazes. You can choose among several different algorithms, move the start and the finish or draw your own walls...

projects.title: Shipping Container Monitoring Cum Tracking System Using GPS & GSM
projects.description: This program is an n-body type simulation using GPU acceleration. It is able to simulate galaxies, galaxy collisions and universes. You can choose a lot of parameters like the speed of the stars, the shape of the galaxy, and more...

projects.title: Invisible Security system using embedded system
projects.description: This system enhances security with discreet monitoring, minimizing the risk of intruder detection. It provides real-time alerts for immediate response to unauthorized access. Its autonomous and customizable design ensures reliable, low-maintenance protection across various environments.

projects.title: Snake Game
projects.description: The game involves controlling a snake to eat food, growing longer with each bite while avoiding collisions with walls and its own tail. Each successful move increases the score and the game’s difficulty. It’s a fun project that combines logic with interactive design.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: This project is a website portfolio made to present my computer science projects. It is a one-page responsive website programmed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript...
